page:
OpenMath Discussion Lists
om@openmath.org
is a general public discussion list for any aspects of OpenMath. For subscriptions and the list archive click here. To send mail to everybody on the list, simply send it to om@openmath.org.
om-announce@openmath.org
is for general announcements related to OpenMath. For subscriptions and the list archive click here.
om-members@openmath.org
is the private list of the society members.
om-sc@openmath.org
is the private list of the society steering committee.
Questions or comments should be directed to om-owner@openmath.org or to om-members-owner@openmath.org.
